guide.title: Clusters running Gentoo
guide.abstract: This document lists clusters that are running Gentoo all around the world.

body.p: This is a brief list of known clusters running Gentoo that have at least 32 cores. Please contact the clustering team if you know of one not yet on this list or have updated information for one already on this list.

ul.li: 7783 cores in 2284 mixed nodes (AMD64, Pentium-4 and Xeon), at 2009-02-20 and expanding by Hyves (Startphone Ltd) for www.hyves.nl
5832 cores in 972 6 GFlops MIPS nodes in the SiCortex SC5832
1200 cores in 75 mixed nodes (Xeon E5520 @ 2.27 GHz and W5590 @ 3.33 GHz), at University of Ottawa - Physics Department - Computational Nanophotonics Group
